title: Get ready for the course
learning_objectives: Learners can access the Posit Cloud workspace for the course.

title: Get ready for the course
learning_objectives: Learners have understood the grading scheme for the course.

title: Get ready for the course
learning_objectives: Learners can open an issue on GitHub and tag the course instructor.

title: Welcome! & Data Science Life-cycle
learning_objectives: Learners can navigate the platforms (Posit Cloud, GitHub, Course Website) that are used to for the course.

title: Welcome! & Data Science Life-cycle
learning_objectives: Learners can render a Quarto file to an output file in HTML, PDF and DOCX format.

title: Welcome! & Data Science Life-cycle
learning_objectives: Learners can list the six elements of the data science lifecycle.

title: Welcome! & Data Science Life-cycle
learning_objectives: Learners can identify four components of a Quarto file (YAML, code chunk, R code, markdown).

title: Exploratory data analysis using visualization & Data organization in spreadsheets
learning_objectives: Learners can describe the four main aesthetic mappings that can be used to visualise data using the ggplot2 R Package.

title: Exploratory data analysis using visualization & Data organization in spreadsheets
learning_objectives: Learners can control the colour scaling applied to a plot using colour as an aesthetic mapping.

title: Exploratory data analysis using visualization & Data organization in spreadsheets
learning_objectives: Learners can compare three different geoms and their use case.

title: Exploratory data analysis using visualization & Data organization in spreadsheets
learning_objectives: Learners can apply a theme to control font types and sizes within a plot.

title: Exploratory data analysis using visualization & Data organization in spreadsheets
learning_objectives: Learners can apply 12 principles for data organisation in spreadsheets in the layout of a collected dataset.

title: Data transformation and descriptive statistics
learning_objectives: Learners can apply ten functions from the dplyr R Package to generate a subset of data for use in a table or plot.

title: Concept of tidy data, vectors and pivoting
learning_objectives: Learners can apply functions from the dplyr R Package to transform their data from a wide to a long format and vice versa.

title: Concept of tidy data, vectors and pivoting
learning_objectives: Learners can list the four main atomic vector types in R.

title: Concept of tidy data, vectors and pivoting
learning_objectives: Learners can explain the three characteristics of tidy data.

title: Joining data & data communication using Quarto
learning_objectives: Learners can use Quarto and Netlify to publish an HTML file.

title: Joining data & data communication using Quarto
learning_objectives: Learners can add literature references to Quarto files using the navigation menu of RStudio visual editor.

title: Joining data & data communication using Quarto
learning_objectives: Learners can cross-reference figures and tables within an Quarto file.

title: Joining data & data communication using Quarto
learning_objectives: Learners can apply functions from the dplyr R Package to join multiple data sets.

title: Capstone Project Submission
learning_objectives: Learners can apply the skills obtained during the course to write a short data analysis project report.

learning_objectives: NA
